name: Rime's quest
description:
Rime's Quest is an exciting adventure in the world of the Roman Empire, where an ordinary traveler decides to leave his everyday life and go on a dangerous journey. During the game, the player will go on an epic quest full of interesting events, riddles and encounters with numerous enemies.

You will explore amazing locations, paying attention to details and revealing the secrets of ancient ruins and mysterious places. With every step your hero takes, new secrets and obstacles are revealed that will have to be overcome to complete his difficult journey.

Game Features:
- A variety of characters with whom you will have to interact
- Unexpected plot twists and exciting events
- Good and pleasant soundtrack
